mapper.select: SELECT oid, mid, ozipcode, oaddress1, oaddress2, odate, oreceiver, otel, ousedmileage, ousedcoupon, opayment, ostatus, oaccountdeadline, odiscounted, ototal, countitem FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, oid, mid, ozipcode, oaddress1, oaddress2, odate, oreceiver, otel, ousedmileage, ousedcoupon, opayment, ostatus, oaccountdeadline, odiscounted, ototal, countitem FROM (SELECT L.oid, L.mid, L.ozipcode, L.oaddress1, L.oaddress2, L.odate, L.oreceiver, L.otel, L.ousedmileage, L.ousedcoupon, L.opayment, L.ostatus, L.oaccountdeadline, L.odiscounted, L.ototal, COUNT(*) as countitem FROM ORDERLIST L, ORDERITEM I WHERE L.oid = I.oid GROUP BY L.oid, L.mid, L.ozipcode, L.oaddress1, L.oaddress2, L.odate, L.oreceiver, L.otel, L.ousedmileage, L.ousedcoupon, L.opayment, L.ostatus, L.oaccountdeadline, L.odiscounted, L.ototal ORDER BY L.odate desc, L.oid desc) WHERE rownum <= #{endRowNo}) WHERE rnum >= #{startRowNo}
SELECT oid, mid, ozipcode, oaddress1, oaddress2, odate, oreceiver, otel, ousedmileage, ousedcoupon, opayment, ostatus, oaccountdeadline, odiscounted, ototal FROM ORDERLIST WHERE OID=#{oid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orderitem (oid, pid, ccolorcode, psize, oamount) VALUES (#{oid}, #{pid}, #{ccolorcode}, #{psize}, #{oamount})

INSERT INTO orderlist (oid, mid, ozipcode, oaddress1, oaddress2, odate, oreceiver, otel, ousedmileage, ousedcoupon, opayment, ostatus, oaccountdeadline, odiscounted, ototal) VALUES (oid_seq.NEXTVAL, #{mid}, #{ozipcode}, #{oaddress1}, #{oaddress2}, SYSDATE-#{backDate}, #{oreceiver}, #{otel}, #{ousedmileage}, #{ousedcoupon}, #{opayment}, #{ostatus}, SYSDATE, #{odiscounted}, #{ototal})

SELECT oid, mid, ozipcode, oaddress1, oaddress2, odate, oreceiver, otel, ousedmileage, ousedcoupon, opayment, ostatus, oaccountdeadline, odiscounted, ototal, countitem FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, oid, mid, ozipcode, oaddress1, oaddress2, odate, oreceiver, otel, ousedmileage, ousedcoupon, opayment, ostatus, oaccountdeadline, odiscounted, ototal, countitem FROM (SELECT L.oid, L.mid, L.ozipcode, L.oaddress1, L.oaddress2, L.odate, L.oreceiver, L.otel, L.ousedmileage, L.ousedcoupon, L.opayment, L.ostatus, L.oaccountdeadline, L.odiscounted, L.ototal, COUNT(*) as countitem FROM ORDERLIST L, ORDERITEM I WHERE L.oid = I.oid
and mid like concat('%'||#{keyword}, '%')
and oreceiver like concat('%'||#{keyword}, '%')
and odate between to_date(#{startdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{enddate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT oid, mid, ozipcode, oaddress1, oaddress2, odate, oreceiver, otel, ousedmileage, ousedcoupon, opayment, ostatus, oaccountdeadline, odiscounted, ototal FROM ORDERLIST WHERE EXTRACT( YEAR FROM ODATE ) = EXTRACT( YEAR FROM SYSDATE ) AND EXTRACT( MONTH FROM ODATE ) = EXTRACT( MONTH FROM SYSDATE )

SELECT oid, mid, ozipcode, oaddress1, oaddress2, odate, oreceiver, otel, ousedmileage, ousedcoupon, opayment, ostatus, oaccountdeadline, odiscounted, ototal FROM ORDERLIST WHERE EXTRACT( YEAR FROM ODATE ) = EXTRACT( YEAR FROM SYSDATE ) AND EXTRACT( MONTH FROM ODATE ) = EXTRACT( MONTH FROM SYSDATE ) AND EXTRACT( DAY FROM ODATE ) = EXTRACT( DAY FROM SYSDATE )

SELECT (EXTRACT(YEAR FROM ODATE) || EXTRACT(MONTH FROM ODATE) ||EXTRACT(DAY FROM ODATE))AS ODATE, COUNT(*) AS NUM FROM ORDERLIST GROUP BY EXTRACT( YEAR FROM ODATE ), EXTRACT( MONTH FROM ODATE ), EXTRACT(DAY FROM ODATE) ORDER BY ODATE

SELECT (EXTRACT(YEAR FROM ODATE) || EXTRACT(MONTH FROM ODATE) ||EXTRACT(DAY FROM ODATE))AS ODATE, COUNT(*) AS NUM FROM ORDERLIST GROUP BY EXTRACT( YEAR FROM ODATE ), EXTRACT( MONTH FROM ODATE ), EXTRACT(DAY FROM ODATE), mid ORDER BY ODATE

SELECT oid, mid, ozipcode, oaddress1, oaddress2, odate, oreceiver, otel, ousedmileage, ousedcoupon, opayment, ostatus, oaccountdeadline, odiscounted, ototal FROM ORDERLIST WHERE EXTRACT( YEAR FROM ODATE ) = EXTRACT( YEAR FROM SYSDATE ) AND EXTRACT( MONTH FROM ODATE ) = #{month}
